titleStmt.title: By the Maior. A proclamation for the reformation of abuses, in the Gaole of Nevv-gate
Proclamations. 1617-09-23
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Lord Mayor.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by VVilliam Iaggard, printer to the Honourable Citie of London,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... at Guildhall, the xxiij. day of September, in the yeere of our Lord God, 1617.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library, London, England.
